short_description: This is the refactored CellNopt in C++ with the ACO solver with OpenMP/MPI support.
long_description: This is the refactored CellNopt in C++ with the ACO solver with OpenMP/MPI support. A description of what CellNopt is and how to use it is available on the [Saez Laboratory website](https://saezlab.github.io/CellNOptR/).

default.name: input_file
default.description: HDF5 input data required by CellNopt
